content: finished measurements approximately 22 x 49 5 materials approximately 656 yds / 600 m of lace weight yarn sample yarn viscose 656 yds / 600 m per 3 5 oz / 100 g skein us 2 5 /3 00 mm - 16 / 40 cm circular needle or longer to accomodate large number of stitches suggestion change the needle size gradually from us 2 5 /3 00 mm to us 5 /3 75 mm as used in the sample row 1 52 us 2 5 /3 00 mm row 53 78 us 3 /3 25 mm row 79 114 us 4 /3 50 mm row 115 158 us 5 /3 75 mm 4 mm crochet hook for provisional cast on & chain bind off notions stitch markers & tapestry needle gauge gauge is not critical on this project but will affect the final dimensions and the amount of yarn used abbreviations cdd center double decrease slip two stitches knitwise knit one pass slipped stitches over chain chain k knit k2tog knit together k3tog knit three stitches together sctog single_crochet together ssk slip slip knit sssk slip slip slip knit st/sts stitch/stitches yo yarn over charted only total row 158 row it s twin the southern hemisphere sky is also free ❤❤ 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-southern-hemisphere-sky
